content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i came upon an object that was triangular in shape.  theoutside was black and in a v shape were five large, nonblinking, white lights. the object appeared to be stationary as i came to a stop to get a better look atsame, the object did not move.  it was much larger than an aircraft. i continuedon home to get my husband but in the five minutes it had disappeared.
content.summary: Hovering, triangle shaped, five large nonflashing.

content.detailedDescription: Many times at night, in bed or awakened from sleep. human like female no hair atall anywhere on body,levitating or in the bed with me...Aligator like head, nobody under blankets... grey-type alien face outside window at night. experiencedparalysis, inability to scream or move. matching scars on each hand betweenthumb and pointing finger. ufos, three, daylight, came together into triangleand then moving off in formation. late afternoon over ocean. cronic nightmares,phobias, occassional paralysis, flashbacks, total fear of being alone or leavinghouse alone. other...Hallucinations? lost time throughout life. sister hassimilar experiences. ritual...Longterm abduction one possibility. need toexplore. have checked several possibilities including sleep paralysis anddisociative identity disorder. diagnosed with post tramatic stress disorderamong other things. i would like to rule out...In order to recover. pleaserespond. thank you.
content.summary: Possible longterm/abduction.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my yard under a tree when i heard a small plane flying over,ilooked up through the tree and saw something  falling out of the plane.Ithought what? sky -litterbugs? i stepped out from under the tree to get a look and saw a mottled graphite diamond shaped craft.It was sightly below the planestail and following it.Shocked i thought what is that thing? as soon as i thoughtthis ,the object stopped!When it stopped it started to quiver.I thought i haveto really observe this thing.Chicken that i am i did not watch long.It was abouttwenty feet long ,the length of the small plane wing. though diamond in shape,itwas an elongated diamond with the horizonal points nipped off.As mentionedbefore it was mottled graphite ,and as it hovered it shook like a bowl full ofjelly.I would like to say i watched this thing until disappeared3bhowever i folded went and into my home,like it was a save place.I do not knowwhat happened to my ufo.
content.summary: Object fell from small plane

content.detailedDescription: 1. outside for reasons i cant remember2. i saw it fly over3. i could not think3b i canno explain it any better than that, i just did not have the ability tothink at the time4. i had no reactions durring the event.  i had a head acheafterwards5. there were 2 objects with no surface features. the first one flewin a straight line and did not stop.  the second flew the exact same patternabout 5 seconds after but did a forward summer-sault directly overhead withoutslowing down.6.  it flew straight and over the horizon.
content.summary: I saw a ufo
Watched 3 ufos moving cross sky then turning strai

content.detailedDescription: Greg was at his home in tampa, fl. in february of 1998 at 5:30 am it was stilldark when he went out to get the morning paper. he then saw a bright light about1/4 to 1/2 miles away at about 25 to 30 degrees. the light moved up to 45degrees and turned a different color, possibly red, (greg is color blind) andstarted shooting up into the sky.  greg called to his wife to ask her to turnoff the house lights so he could see better but when he looked back the objectwas gone. he had thought at first that he had seen a helicopter, but there wasno noise or beam of light shining from it. he described the size as being thatof a quarter at arms length.     several days after the sighting, greg visited a 95 year old woman who lived "acouple of blocks away".  the woman, now deceased, said that she had seen a lightshining through her window and the light made her feel "so good".  the lightthat the woman had seen was at the same time and in the same position as the onegreg had seen.
content.summary: Sighting of light in 1998
Cigar shaped ufo 6-26-94 lincoln city, or.

content.detailedDescription: I was hiking in the desert at saguaro natl monument (west) near tucson andtaking pictures of the cactus about 1 hour before sunset. i didnt see anythingat the time but when i had the photos developed, there it was, hovering over thecactus. cloud shaped with landing gear beneath. i had another reprint of thatexposure made and it is still there. i thought it might have been something inthe developing. i have shown it to several people (all get goosebumps) and theysay it doesnt look like a double exposure or even a reflexion of anything. ineed another opinion. can you help? even if its not a ufo, its a reallyextraordinary picture. i wrote to tom sheets... (mufon/isur, georgia) about itand he told me to get ahold of you. i work days and can be reached in theevenings.  thank you.
content.summary: I have a photo i took of a ufo?

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the drive way having a cigarette.  the sky was/is so cleartonight i was just admiring the stars.  then out of the north (heading south) isaw three lights in succesion moving across the sky.  the altitude was high.  arough guess would be about a mile.  as the object grew closer (it was movingextremly fast relative to jet traffic)i could make out a slight bluishluminescence that created a cylindrical shape, with the three lights onside/bottom.  the three lights remained the same intensity with no fluctuation. this object would have be at least 1/4 mile long.  the object then bankedslightly overhead and headed east, highlighting the luminescence.  i blinked myeyes to make sure that i was not having some kind of hallucination.  (this seemsrather unscientific in retrospect)the object faded with the distance it wascovering into the east.  i was and am stunned. i tried to call the #800 but noone was there and felt ridiculous leaving a message.If anyone else reports thisor you figure out what it was please let me know.
content.summary: Object over wisconsin/illinois
A craft moved across the sky and stopped for appro
Ufo over the berkshires in 1993

content.detailedDescription: The owner of a recreational facility was checking on the property. he observed abright white light in the distance. a box-shaped object (estimated footballfield proportions) approached and passed into the distance on a straight line,moving slower than a conventional aircraft. large, horizontally allignedrectangular "windows" along the sides emitted intense white light. smaller,vertical windows were closely spaced on the rear. many small, steady red lightsformed a rounded square pattern on the underside. at its closest, the object wasperhaps half a mile distance and 500 feet above the ground. it accelerated as itmoved into the distance. no sound was heard. duration was estimated as 5minutes.
content.summary: Box-shaped object in il.

content.detailedDescription: 1 - sitting at my garage door facing east smokin a cigarette2 - im alwayslooking at the sky...Noticed the pulsating moving lights3 - no clue..Ive seenaircraft, satellites, etc. these light had resemblence4 - calm duringobservation, reserved excitement after immediatly going inside    and informingmy wife.5 - 4 loosely grouped (within a quarter held at arms length) pulsatinglights    pulsated independently and surged forward independantly with eachpulse    (leapfrog no discernable pattern). first observed 80 deg overhead toapprox    45 deg above horizon travelling nw -3e se taking approx 5-10 seconds to    cover that arc with each object pulsing4-5 times.6 - lost sighting because of neighbors housesighting occured inoctober of either 1998 or 1999 10:00 pm cdt (i was waitin for 10pm news)
content.summary: 4 strangly pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to take a break from working in a doctors office.Was noticing howdark it had got by 6:30pm...While looking up at the sky i saw a point oflight...It started to desend and thats what caught my attention.While  it wasdesending i motioned for my associate to look up at it. several unknown personsstopped at our location and also observed the light.The unknown persons becameexcited and pointed and briefly talked about it and then ran off. steve andmyself continued to observe the light as it desended, brightened orenlarged,hovered, then asended to approx. to the point that we originally saw itbefore it came down. the speed was medium. after it reached its point of orginit blinked out and was no longer visible.
content.summary: A small but bright light desended,enlarged, then a

content.detailedDescription: Donald came inside and told us he saw a strange looking star, like a double starbut with flashing lights.  we went and looked, we saw something and then itdisapeared.  we went to get the binoculars and found it, it was like two lightsflashing white, and then red - green - and blue lights flashing very brightly. it didnt seem to be moving.  after about a half an hour or so it is stillthere.  we all looked through the binoculars and were very intrigued.  it isabout the size of a planet in the sky.  it is north of us, and a bit west.  weare on an island in lake champlain.  we remembered reading of a sighting in thelocal paper last week and we looked up the web sight.
content.summary: A planet-size, red-green, rapidly blinking light

content.detailedDescription: A lebanon, il police officer received a call from the st. clair county sheriffdept that a citizen had reported a ufo. minutes later the officer spottedintense white lights approaching. as the object passed almost directly overheadat an estimated 1000-foot altitude, it pivoted without banking and so changedfrom a s to a sw course. the object was described as a black isosceles triangle (conservatively estimatedas 75 ft in length by 40 ft in width). large, bright unwavering white lightswere near each axex, seemingly pointing down, while a small, pulsing red lightwas centered near the rear of the underside. no sound was heard.The officer followed the object in his cruiser at approximately the objectsspeed to a nearby town, then parked to observe further. as the object continuedinto the distance, he detected the rear as appearing rectangular, illuminated bywhite mixed with a multi-colored band of light. the object suddenly acceleratedto a great speed. the officer radioed the sheriff dept as to the objects direction. a momentlater, an officer from the shiloh pd radioed that he had the object in sight.Duration of the lebanon pd officers observation was 10 minutes.
content.summary: Triangular object passes above police officer in i

content.detailedDescription: We were inside on the pc when my dog started barking and my tv and pc bothcrashed and all sings of power sources were lost including torches.We went outside to the lake to find a object hovering above our house.It had no sound andleft about after an hour.It was about 20m of the ground and a thing startedhovering under the aircraft laura said it was an alien but it couldnt have beenbecause none of us believed in them it dropped something in the dirt and when ithit the ground a lightning bolt hit the tree behind us and we looked back at thecraft and it was gone we went and had a look at the object it apeared to becircular and very hot so went back inside and came back in the morning and itwas gone
content.summary: It had coloured lights revolving around it and was

content.detailedDescription: I was comming home from visiting my parents with my daughter.  when we reachedmy house we pulled into the garage like always.  i thought i would show my 2 y/odaughter some stars in the back yard.  this is when i looked up and noticed agreyish large v-shaped object traveling extreemly fast in a staight path.  nonoise at all were heard, and i feel the object was low enough that any typicalaircraft would be heard.  the sighting only lasted about 4-5 secconds because ofthe tree line .  definitely a strange calm and quiet atmosphere around us whenthis happened.  thank you.....Vincent b. bucy
content.summary: Night sighting in northern ohio.

content.detailedDescription: Three girls on a sleepover were awakened at 3 am by a bright light shining inthe bedroom window. they then observed a smallish triangular object descenedfrom 300 feet into the side yard of the home. they heard beeping, whirring andthumping sounds which they associated with its landing, but the landing spot wasout of their view.At about 3:30 the host-witness saw what she took to be a blue-hued entity (morelikely blue garmented) standing outside the glass patio door to her mothersbedroom. later all three saw this being looking in through the kitchen window.The being was described as over 4 feet tall, with large green eyes, a widemouth, and no nose, ears or hair. later all three girls saw this being.A second being, 2 1/2 tall, appeared similar to the first one except for itsshorter height, white skin (or, again, tight-fitting apparel) and red eyes. thisone stood outside a glass door making facial gestures to the girls and a bowingtype motion.A third being was seen only fleetingly, was thought to be of a height betweenthose of the first two, and was described only as purple.At one point, while standing in the livingroom, the girls saw the doorknob to aninfants bedroom turn. they were too frightened to approach.All three screamed repeatedly for the mother of the host-witness to wake up, butshe heard nothing. apparently no definitive conclusion to the incident wasoffered. the following morning the girl took her mother outside and discoveredapproximately 15 two-inch circular depressions in the ground that formed anoverall triangular pattern. samples of the grass and soil were taken andsubmitted for testing.
content.summary: Small triangular vehicle and home intrusion in nc.
